document.full_text: western and arab countries opposed to muammar gaddafi pledged to unlock hundreds of millions of dollars to help libya's rebels thursday as they tried to step up the pressure to drive him from power.
document.title: anti-gaddafi countries pledge millions to rebels
lines_and_colors: western and arab countries opposed to muammar gaddafi pledged to unlock hundreds of millions of dollars to help libya's rebels thursday as they tried to step up the pressure to drive him from power.
